Key Match Events: Cleveland Cavaliers closed the game with an 18-8 run in the last six minutes to steal the lead from the Milwaukee Bucks.
Darius Garland scored 12 of his 39 points in the final 6:06, and a defensive breakdown allowed Jarrett Allen to seal the win with a block.
Post-Match Reflections: Doc Rivers addressed the Bucks' defense breakdown, stating, 'Those are the things that just kill you. You play so hard, man, and then you make these little self-inflicted wounds.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Bucks fought hard until the final buzzer but couldn't overcome defensive struggles and key missed opportunities.
